thread.title: Bruce Springsteen: 400 extra tickets go on sale for Christchurch concert
thread.title_full: Bruce Springsteen: 400 extra tickets go on sale for Christchurch concert

title: Bruce Springsteen: 400 extra tickets go on sale for Christchurch concert
text:
* The teenager who stole Bruce Springsteen's Brisbane show 
Frontier Touring New Zealand representative Brent Eccles said the extra tickets were "exciting news" for fans. 
"At the very last minute, the exciting news is that 400 of the best seats in the house have just gone on sale through Ticketek due to a late production change," he said. 
The extra tickets apparently weren't planned, but after a venue walk-through on Monday morning, promoters realised they could fit more people inside. 
The show is due to kick off at around 5pm on Tuesday at AMI Stadium.
